根: (sei lá/não) - root , root (of a plant); root (of a tooth, hair, etc.), center (of a pimple, etc.); root (of all evil, etc.), source, origin, cause, basis; one's true nature
根から: (ねから) - since the beginning/natural-born (salesman, etc.); (followed by a verb in negative form) absolutely (not)/(not) at all
根から葉から: (ねからはから) - (followed by a verb in negative form) absolutely (not); (not) at all
根がつく: (ねがつく) - to take root; to strike root
根が付く: (ねがつく) - to take root; to strike root

根ざす: (ねざす) - to come from; to have roots in

根っから葉っから: (ねっからはっから) - (followed by a verb in negative form) absolutely (not); (not) at all
根っ木: (ねっき) - children's game in which a wooden stick driven into the ground is dislodged by sticks thrown at it
根っ木打ち: (ねっきうち) - children's game in which a wooden stick driven into the ground is dislodged by sticks thrown at it

根も葉もない: (ねもはもない) - unfounded rumor; unfounded rumour; completely untrue
根も葉も無い噂: (ねもはもないうわさ) - groundless rumor; groundless rumour
根を張る: (ねをはる) - to spread one's roots (of a tree, etc.); to take root (of an ideology, etc.)
根を生じる: (ねをしょうじる) - to take root; to put forth roots
根を生やす: (ねをはやす) - to plant oneself/to settle in; to be well-established (e.g. of a religion in a particular area)/to have taken root
根を詰める: (こんをつめる) - to persevere; to keep at something (regardless of one's fatigue)

根切り: (ねぎり) - root cutting; excavation (as preparation for construction)
根刮ぎ: (ねこそぎ) - root and branch; thoroughly; by the roots; completely; all
